It's time to say goodbye to upcami, the show that Reina Ichioka and Momo Kitahara have been presenting for you.
We've been watching a lot of videos this time, but I, Kitahara, would like to introduce you to two new members of Morning Musume。 23 new members' dance lessons left a strong impression on me.
Seeing them working so hard made me go back to the basics, or rather, I wanted to work harder.
Yes, I, Reina Ichioka, was a brass instrumentalist for the recording of "Can't even dream a dream in the night sky.
I feel very strongly that I was able to perform this song thanks to the help or cooperation of so many people.
I would like to keep performing each and every time with great care.
